parameters.name: showhand
parameters.description: Whether to show the hand graphic. Set from 1 to 0 to hide hand.

parameters.name: useReverse
parameters.description: Whether to reverse the piles (i.e., low to hi versus hi to low). Some tests do this automatically.

parameters.name: testtype
parameters.description: Test to use. use code in initial dialog to select test here (1..9,0,A,...). Setting to -1 will present selection dialog in-test.

parameters.name: timelimit
parameters.description: Time limit, in seconds, for the test (when gUseTimer is non-zero, which is set in each test)

parameters.name: allowreset
parameters.description: Whether to allow the problem to be 'reset' by subject.

parameters.name: allowskip
parameters.description: Whether to allow the problem to be 'skipped' by subject.
